name: Connected-AI
description:
Connected-AI is a 3D platformer and puzzle solving game, in which you will need to complete three different trials.

All the C++ scripts made for the game are mine, except the Third person character (which is provided by default when creating a third person project in Unreal Engine 4 and which I have extended for my own purposes). All the UI elements have been made through Blueprints and the rest is purely C++. The rest of the elements present in the game are not mine, they are either provided by default from UE4 or obtained from the following sources:

UI Buttons: https://punchev.com/scifibtns/

ButtonClickSound: https://freesound.org/people/NenadSimic/sounds/171697/

Main menu music: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/259436/

Game background music: https://freesound.org/people/akelley6/sounds/453017/

Materialize effect sound: https://freesound.org/people/Leszek_Szary/sounds/146729/

Button interact sound: https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/sounds/219478/

Interact sound: https://freesound.org/people/Natty23/sounds/348356/

Swap bodies sound: https://freesound.org/people/draperz/sounds/221802/

Step sounds: http://www.mediafire.com/file/5l4lboxawq0m673/DifferentFootstepsFiles.zip/file

Jump sound: https://freesound.org/people/IanLyanx/sounds/446806/

Out of energy sound: https://freesound.org/people/peepholecircus/sounds/169994/

Change color panel sound: https://freesound.org/people/Leszek_Szary/sounds/146727/

Win sound: https://freesound.org/people/Mativve/sounds/391539/

Sci-fi 3D models: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/item/1be33a8886ea4fa5898df2aeeda9...

Materialize VFX: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/materialize-vfx
